name: Tailspin Tommy's
about: Tailspin Tommy's Aircraft Repair and Flight School, located at 300 Airport Road in Port Townsend, WA, is a premier aviation training facility inspired by the legendary aviation-adventure comic strip "Tailspin Tommy." Our school honors the spirit of adventure and aviation excellence embodied by the comic's protagonist, Tommy Tomkins. We offer comprehensive flight training programs, aircraft repair services, and a dedicated team of experienced instructors. Our state-of-the-art facilities and commitment to safety ensure that students receive the highest quality education. Whether you're a novice pilot or an experienced aviator, Tailspin Tommy's is your gateway to the skies. Join us and take your flying dreams to new heights.
